author: @nillionnetwork
text:
The first Nillion Shark Tank was a hit!

Out of 4 projects, @SigeaOfficial won the crowd’s vote.

They are building a decentralized, privacy-first storage platform where your files stay encrypted and owned by you.

Link below! https://t.co/cYUKNik0Qy

text:
